title: Cybermancy (Daggerheart Extension)
description: Cyberpunk/Shadowrun-flavored extension for Daggerheart: custom sheets, extra fields, roll helpers, and compendia.

scripts.pack:weapons: fvtt package pack -n items-weapons --id cybermancy --type Module --inputDirectory ./src-data/items/weapons --outputDirectory ./packs
scripts.pack:armors: fvtt package pack -n items-armors --id cybermancy --type Module --inputDirectory ./src-data/items/armors --outputDirectory ./packs
scripts.pack:consumables: fvtt package pack -n items-consumables --id cybermancy --type Module --inputDirectory ./src-data/items/consumables --outputDirectory ./packs
scripts.pack:loot: fvtt package pack -n items-loot --id cybermancy --type Module --inputDirectory ./src-data/items/loot --outputDirectory ./packs
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:weapons && npm run pack:armors && npm run pack:consumables && npm run pack:loot
scripts.unpack:weapons: fvtt package unpack -n items-weapons --id cybermancy --type Module --outputDirectory ./src-data/items/weapons
scripts.unpack:armors: fvtt package unpack -n items-armors --id cybermancy --type Module --outputDirectory ./src-data/items/armors
scripts.unpack:consumables: fvtt package unpack -n items-consumables --id cybermancy --type Module --outputDirectory ./src-data/items/consumables
scripts.unpack:loot: fvtt package unpack -n items-loot --id cybermancy --type Module --outputDirectory ./src-data/items/loot
scripts.unpack:all: npm run unpack:weapons && npm run unpack:armors && npm run unpack:consumables && npm run unpack:loot
